description: This file sets up and runs an AI agent using the 'agno' framework, specifically configuring it with the Gemini model and financial tools, then prompts it to generate a comparison report between NVDA and TSLA.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent class from the 'agno' framework used to configure and run AI models with tools.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output the agent's response to a prompt.
